overview: Get ready for dirty and twisted tales of urban folklore brought to you by one of the best director's in the Industry - Jerome Tanner.  "Give me ninety minutes of your time and I'll give you one hell of a show every time." This is the director's pledge and he is certainly  true to his word in this scorching hot third installment in the series. Don't miss a second of this hardcore sexy fun!
tagline: Dirty, Twisted Tales of Urban Folklore!
title: Tales From The Script 3
